TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManipulationStartingEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ManipulationStartingEventArgs Inherits InputEventArgs
public ref class ManipulationStartingEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::Input::InputEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您指定的操作行為。The enable you to specify the behavior of a manipulation. 使用執行下列動作：Use the to do the following: - 指定的位置必須是相對於項目，藉由設定屬性。Specify that the position should be relative to an element by setting the property. - 指定是否啟用單指操作，以藉由設定屬性。Specify whether single-finger manipulation are enabled by setting the property. - 指定藉由設定啟用何種類型的操作屬性設列舉型別。Specify which types of manipulation are enabled by setting the property to a enumeration. - 藉由設定指定單指的旋轉中心的屬性。Specify the center of a single-finger rotation by setting the property. - 藉由設定取消操作屬性設`true`。Cancel the manipulation by setting the property to `true`. 如需有關操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需回應操作的應用程式的範例，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Cancel() cil managed

summary.span: 取消操作並將觸控提升為滑鼠事件。

span.span: Cancels the manipulation and promotes touch to mouse events.

returns.span: 如果觸控成功提升為滑鼠事件，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if touch was successfully promoted to mouse events, otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果方法成功，預設值傳送先前停機事件觸控與滑鼠向下事件和未來的操作事件不會發生。If the method succeeds, the default sends previous touch down events as mouse down events and future manipulation events do not occur.

summary.span: 取得或設定容器，所有操作事件和計算都包含在這個容器中。

span.span: Gets or sets the container that all manipulation events and calculations are relative to.

value.span: 所有操作事件和計算都包含在的容器。

span.span: The container that all manipulation events and calculations are relative to.

value.span: 預設值為發生事件的項目。

span.span: The default is the element on which the event occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定的位置必須是相對於另一個項目，藉由設定屬性。You can specify that the position should be relative to another element by setting the property. 例如，您可以進行操作間的相對位置的接收操作事件的項目父代。For example, you can make the manipulation positions relative to the parent of the element that receives the manipulation events. 事件處理常式是唯一的地方，您可以在其中設定。The event handler is the only place in which you can set the . 如需有關操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需回應操作的應用程式的範例，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定物件，這個物件描述單點操作的樞紐。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that describes the pivot for a single-point manipulation.

value.span: 物件，描述單點操作的樞紐。

span.span: An object that describes the pivot for a single-point manipulation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將設定屬性，當使用者於操作期間使用一隻手指操作會包含輪替的資料。When you set the property, the manipulation will contain rotation data when the user uses one finger during a manipulation. 這是為了模擬真實世界情況下，您可以使用一隻手指旋轉物件，例如在資料表上的紙張。This is to simulate real-world situations where you can use one finger to rotate an object, such as a piece of paper on a table. 如果是`null`，使用者必須使用兩指會造成循環。If the is `null`, the user must use two fingers to cause rotation. 如需有關操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需回應操作的應用程式的範例，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件，並將屬性。The following example shows an event handler for the event and sets the property. 若要測試此範例中，請遵循[逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)並取代此程式碼中的步驟 4 中的程式碼。To test this example, follow the steps in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md) and replace the code in step 4 with this code. [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationPivot](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/reportboundaryfeedbackexample.xaml.cs#manipulationpivot)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationPivot](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/reportboundaryfeedbackexample.xaml.vb#manipulationpivot)]

summary.span: 將參數加入至所指定項目目前的操作。

span.span: Adds parameters to the current manipulation of the specified element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不需要呼叫這個方法。You typically do not need to call this method. 使用屬性改。Use the properties on the instead.
